description:
This is a market on whether Floyd Mayweather will win his boxing exhibition match against Logan Paul, which is currently set to take place on June 6, 2021 at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami. If Floyd Mayweather is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve “Yes.” If Logan Paul is declared the winner, or this fight is declared a draw, this market will resolve to “No”. If, for any reason, this match is postponed and a new fight date is set for June 30, 2021, or earlier, the same rules for market resolution will apply for the rescheduled fight. If this match is rescheduled for any date after June 30, 2021 or canceled altogether, the market will resolve to .90 for "Yes" and .10 for "No", which is in line with existing market odds. In the event of ambiguity in regards to the outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith by the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

Update: If no official winner is declared, even if one of the contestants is knocked out or the fight is stopped early, then the market will resolve to .90 for "Yes" and .10 for "No", which is in line with previously existing market odds.

markets.question: Will Floyd Mayweather beat Logan Paul in their rescheduled exhibition boxing match?
